name: Adventure Time (new Updates on Dec.10th, 2020)
description:
Adventure Time (New Updates on Dec.10th, 2020)

Youtube Demon link

How to Play

  1. WASD for moving the player
  2. There is a pause button on the right-top side, you can save the game there.
  3. If you step on the tall grass, you can meet enemy Pokemon, and you can choose the options to defeat the enemy or escape. 
  4. **Developer mode                   

               - left shift: move speed ( x 5)

               - right shift: back to original speed
